document_data.mainbody:
Lady Eshvelt Guthmere was a senior member of the noble patriar Guthmere family of Baldurs Gate and a member of the Parliament of Peers in the late 15 century DR.
Eshvelt was a human woman with a tan skin tone, gray eyes, and short black curly hair. Eshvelt wore an expensive duplet and a fanciful hat with two decorative feathers.
In the , shortly before the armies of the Cult of the Absolute attacked the city of Baldurs Gate, Lady Eshvelt Guthmere was a Parliamentarian of the Gate and voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord Enver Gortash as the citys Archduke. Lady Guthmere was present for Gortashs coronation that took place in the audience hall of Wyrms Rock. Following the coronation, Eshvelt voiced her trust in Gortashs commitment to securing Baldurs Gate.
